shortDescription: This vulnerability is present in device_graph_page.php script, which is a part of the Advantech R-SeeNet web applications. A specially crafted URL by an attacker and visited by a victim can lead to arbitrary JavaScript code execution.
vulnerabilityName: advantech r-seenet Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
